title: Three Mile, Papua New Guinea
text: 3 Mile is a residential suburb of <a href="Port%20Moresby">Port Moresby</a>, the capital city of <a href="Papua%20New%20Guinea">Papua New Guinea</a>. It is adjacent to <a href="Korobosea">Korobosea</a> and The Port Moresby General Hospital is also inside this suburb.
